section.title: Install and configure controller node
section.paragraph: This section describes how to install and configure the Shared File Systems service, code-named manila, on the controller node. This service requires at least one additional share node that manages file storage back ends.
This section assumes that you already have a working OpenStack environment with at least the following components installed: Compute, Image Service, Identity.
Note that installation and configuration vary by distribution.
